00036 #define _DWFCORE_WCHAR_MAX      __WCHAR_MAX__
00037 #define _DWFCORE_SHRT_MAX       __SHRT_MAX__
00038 #define _DWFCORE_INT_MAX        __INT_MAX__
00039 
00040 typedef int BOOL;
00041 
00042 #if (_DWFCORE_WCHAR_MAX == _DWFCORE_SHRT_MAX)
00043 
00044 typedef char        ASCII_char_t;
00045 typedef wchar_t     UCS2_char_t;
00046 typedef u_int32_t   UCS4_char_t;
00047 
00048 #else
00049

00051 typedef u_int16_t   UCS2_char_t;
00052 typedef wchar_t     UCS4_char_t;
